entry.content:
About Me

I'm a Python developer with experience automating tasks, building apps and writing about Python coding. Send me your project, event or questions. Collaborative inquiries welcome.

email: erickbuildsstuff[at]outlook[dot]com LinkedIn

Projects + Apps

positivipy, text generation flask + mysql app built with fuzzywuzzy, ftfy, language_tool_python, textblob and markovify libraries

rst-url-validator, a tool for validating urls in restructuredtext documents

restaurant profit projector, a streamlit dashboard for projecting profit scenarios in a restaurant

mas tacos, proof of concept app with a US taco restaurant dataset

Ask Tame Impala, web2py + MongoDB Tame Impala lyrics search app
